mapper.select: SELECT F1.COMPLAIN_ID, F1.QUERY_CODE, F1.ACCEPT_TIME, F1.BYCOMPLAINED_USER_ORG, F1.BYCOMPLAINED_USER_POST, F1.BYCOMPLAINED_ORG, F1.COMPLAIN_USER_NAME, F1.COMPLAIN_USER_MOBILE, F1.COMPLAIN_USER_CARD, F1.COMPLAIN_TITLE, F1.COMPLAIN_CONTENT, F1.LEADER_IDEA, F1.ENREGISTER_TIME, F1.STATE, F2.PROBLEM_TYPE_NAME AS PROBLEM_TYPE, F1.PROBLEM_SMALL_TYPE, F1.IS_SATISFIED, F1.NOT_SATISFIED_REASON, F1.LASTMODIFYTIME, F1.IS_PUBLIC, F1.HANDLE_STATUS, F1.EXPIRE_DATE, F1.ACCEPT_USER_ID, F1.HANDLE_USER_ID, F1.COMPLAIN_USER_ORG, F1.COMPLAIN_USER_PHONE, F1.REPLY_ORGNAME, F1.REPLY_ORGID, F1.REPLY_TIME, F1.REPLY_USER_ID, F1.COMMITNUM, F1.COMPLAIN_USER_ADDRESS, F1.BYCOMPLAINED_USER_ADDRESS, F1.BYCOMPLAINED_USER_PHONE, F1.PROBLEM_MODE, F1.MAINAPPEAL, F1.PROESSSTATE, F1.CORRELATIONID, F1.HANDLEIS_PUBLIC, F1.CASENO, F1.COMMITMENT_LIMIT, F1.ISSURERECEIVE, F1.TASKID, F1.IS_EXAMINE, F1.IS_PREACCEPSEND, F1.IS_ACCEPTSEND, F1.ACCEPT_ORG_ID, F1.ISLOCALSECTOR, F1.ACCEPT_ORG_NAME, F1.ACCEPT_ORG_LEVEL, F1.SURE_RECEIVE_TIME, F1.BRACHCANSHIFT, F1.COMMITMENT_CITY_LIMIT, F1.EXPIRE_CITY_DATE, F1.EXTENS_DAY, F1.EXTENS_REASON, F1.END_TIME, F1.accept_org_first FROM TA_JC_COMPLAIN_BASEINFO F1 INNER JOIN TA_JC_DIC_PROBLEM_TYPE F2 ON F1.PROBLEM_TYPE = F2.PROBLEM_TYPE_ID where F1.complain_id = #{complainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TA_JC_COMPLAIN_BASEINFO( COMPLAIN_ID, QUERY_CODE, BYCOMPLAINED_USER_ORG, BYCOMPLAINED_ORG, COMPLAIN_USER_NAME, COMPLAIN_USER_MOBILE, COMPLAIN_USER_CARD, COMPLAIN_TITLE, COMPLAIN_CONTENT, COMPLAIN_USER_ORG, COMPLAIN_USER_PHONE, PROBLEM_TYPE, ENREGISTER_TIME, IS_PUBLIC, STATE, COMMITNUM, COMPLAIN_USER_ADDRESS, BYCOMPLAINED_USER_ADDRESS, BYCOMPLAINED_USER_PHONE, PROBLEM_MODE, MAINAPPEAL, PROESSSTATE, CORRELATIONID, HANDLE_STATUS, ACCEPT_ORG_ID, ACCEPT_ORG_NAME, ISLOCALSECTOR, ACCEPT_ORG_LEVEL, COMPLAIN_SOURCE, accept_org_first, accept_org_first_name ) values ( #{complainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bycomplainedUserOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bycomplainedOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainUserMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainUserCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainUserOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{isPublic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{complainUserAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bycomplainedUserAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bycomplainedUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainappeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proessstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{correlationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{islocalsector,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{acceptOrgLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptOrgFirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptOrgFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
